title: Mahogany Leaf Block
summaries: Mahogany Leaf Blocks are blocks that can be found naturally at the top of Living Mahogany Trees located in the Underground Jungle Biome.

Mahogany Leaf Blocks can be placed by players via the <linked>Rich Mahogany Leaf Wand</linked> at a cost of 1 <linked>Rich Mahogany</linked> each. Mahogany Leaf Blocks cannot exist in a player's <linked>Inventory</linked>, as breaking any placed Mahogany Leaf Blocks will not drop any items.
